assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors note that LG and PT are two of the coinventors of patents related to theg/hprimers and the use of the P6 loop of the chloroplast trnL(UAA) intron for plant identification using degraded template DNA. These patents only restrict commercial applications and have no impact on the use of this locus by academic researchers.
